DOC.brief_summary: This study is to test the efficacy and safety of the combination of olmesartan and amlodipine in hypertensive patients whose blood pressure is not adequately controlled with amlodipine alone
DOC.brief_title: Olmesartan as an Add-on to Amlodipine in Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Without antihypertensive pretreatment mean seated BP greater than 160/100 mmHg Pretreatment with amlodipine 5 or 10 mg: mean seated BP greater than or equal to 140/90 mmHg Secondary hypertension Any serious disorder which may limit the ability to evaluate the efficacy or safety of the test drugs
